title: Better Grass
description: Better Grass shows the side grass texture on grass blocks that are near other grass blocks.

grass.description: Enables Better Grass for Grass Blocks.

dirt_path.description: Enables Better Grass for grass path blocks.

crimson_nylium.description: Enables Better Grass for Crimson Nylium.

warped_nylium.description: Enables Better Grass for Warped Nylium.

grass.snow.description: Enables Better Grass for Grass Blocks that have a snow layer or snow block on top of them.

mycelium.snow.description: Enables Better Grass for Mycelium that has a snow layer or snow block on top of them.

podzol.snow.description: Enables Better Grass for Podzol that has a snow layer or snow block on top of them.

grass.multilayer.description: Allows a transparent grass texture to be used as an overlay for the grass block's side.

texture.grass.description: What texture to use for the top of a grass block which has Better Grass applied to it.

texture.grass_side.description: What texture to use for the side of a grass block which has Better Grass applied to it.

texture.dirt_path.description: What texture to use for the top of a dirt path block which has Better Grass applied to it.

texture.dirt_path_side.description: What texture to use for the side of a dirt path block which has Better Grass applied to it.

texture.mycelium.description: What texture to use for the top of a Mycelium block which has Better Grass applied to it.

texture.podzol.description: What texture to use for the top of a Podzol block which has Better Grass applied to it.

texture.crimson_nylium.description: What texture to use for the top of a Crimson Nylium block which has Better Grass applied to it.

texture.warped_nylium.description: What texture to use for the top of a Warped Nylium block which has Better Grass applied to it.

texture.snow.description: What texture to use for the top of a Snow block which has Better Grass applied to it.
